description: Images commissioned by the BBC reveal the damage in Gaza before the recent temporary truce started.
maintext: As the image below shows, a whole series of craters are visible in what was once a residential area. Some of the buildings on the beach front, which boasted Gaza's first five-star hotel, the Al-Mashtal, as well as huts and restaurants, appear to have been partially destroyed.
title: Nearly 100,000 Gaza buildings may be damaged, satellite images show
